Speech Day
I hope to see all families from Reception to Year 9 at Speech Day tomorrow for what should be a fantastic celebration of progress and achievement this year. The event will start at 10am prompt in the Ritz Carlton Ballroom.
The address of the hotel is Tverskaya Street 3 and underground parking is available next to the hotel.
We look forward to celebrating the success of our students and saying fond farewells before the summer break.
Class lists
Class lists have now been finalized for the next academic year and you will receive confirmation of this eagerly awaited information before the break.
Tottenham Hotspur
Just as a final follow up to this successful event, please see the links below to recent media coverage. Particularly great for Spanish speakers!

Happy Holidays
Finally we would like to wish you a fantastic break. We hope that you have a wonderful summer full of great family memories and look forward to welcoming you back in August. For those moving on from Moscow we wish you well and hope that you will keep in touch!
The first day of school for students will be Monday August 27th.
We look forward to seeing you then!
Happy Holidays!
Paul Seedhouse
